root.name: Winter Voices Prologue: Avalanche
root.description: Winter Voices is developed by French indie developer Beyond The Pillars. The game revolves around a female protagonist whose father recently passed away. Exploration is done in traditional point click fashion, and interaction between NPC characters is text based. The turn-based battles occur in a gridded environment. The enemies come in the form of bad memories and other psychological terrors. The players purpose on the battle grid is to survive for a number of rounds or escape from the current grid.
